hurried: Since you want to offset the icon to the top right, you will need to offset the ( x, y ) position slightly, but make sure you use dp because if you simply offset the ( x, y ) by some amount it willnot translate to different devices.

If you have more than one event in the day make sure to just draw once because it's wasteful to draw multiple time in your case.
